channel.title: How do i post pics MUST REPLY
channel.description: Does any1 Know how to get pictures of ur server and post em on ur topic and can tell me? or give me a link of where i can get the thing to get pics

item.description:
@ralazo wrote:

[quote=“azn pker1”][quote author=ralazo link=topic=74211.msg834449#msg834449 date=1170006475]
please talk normal not whit u but normal whit you
make a pic whit Prtscn
use paint save it
and use http://imageshack.us/
and than insert image and the link
[/quote]

Why dont u speak normal u greedy slut
i just click on that? i dont see me getting no pics[br][size=1]Posted on: January 28, 2007, 07:07:37 AM[/size][hr]And where am i going to get “paint”[/quote]
omg lol i dont gonna help you anymore calling my greedy slut
